text:
RT @RobGMacfarlane: A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
M…
Absolutely appalling attack on our wildlife in #Herefordshire, please investigate @EnvAgency and be on the right side of protecting the #environment https://t.co/Y5vc6uXgfy
No just ministers but the  @JamesBevanEA  @EnvAgency  EA who waste money and do not follow regulators guidelines.-in fact they hide liars and whitewash complaints https://t.co/xMD413QS10

text:
RT @Feargal_Sharkey: I've often ask the question "And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?"

Transpires we now have an answer. It's not a lot.…

RT @EnvAgencyYNE: Have a look at our latest news bulletin about #HebdenBridgeFAS outlining early works taking place to prepare for the floo…
@paulrhodes180 @AndyWoodturner @RobGMacfarlane @silverpebble @EnvAgency Yes, the response needs to be more than a fine for exactly this reason.
@RobGMacfarlane @AmyJaneBeer @EnvAgency I'm sure they will, but is there an effective deterrent in even a successful prosecution? Bet it'll just be a slap on the wrist.

RT @RobGMacfarlane: A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.

@MikeDWinter @RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency Yes, we need to see the @EnvAgency responding with the urgency necessary to combat this kind of devastating action, protecting the river and its flora & fauna.

urls.title: Horror at destruction of nationally important UK river | The Wildlife Trusts
urls.description: Major damage to River Lugg in Herefordshire will be test case for Government commitment to strengthen wildlife protection.

text: ”To meet its promise of ‘word-leading’ environmental enforcement post-Brexit, the Government needs to urgently commit to stepping up resourcing for @NaturalEngland and @EnvAgency as well as a truly independent Office for Environmental Protection.” Oh yes! https://t.co/rlh0TpP8AB
